archimate:Requirement.name: SM.2.2.4d: d) providing support for protecting the information associated with specialist systems (e.g. the Internet of Things (IoT) or systems that support industrial control systems)
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
